ComicInfo.Summary:
"SOMETHING TO FEAR" CONTINUES!
This extra-sized chapter contains one of the darkest moments in Rick Grimes' life, and one of the most violent and brutal things to happen within the pages of this series. 100 issues later, this series remains just as relentless as the debut issue. Do not miss the monumental 100th issue of THE WALKING DEAD!

Notes:
The "Lucille" Variant is the 15th variant and limited to 500 copies; all signed by Robert Kirkman. These copies were given to retailers, one per store, with large orders and who increased their order the most for issue 100. More than 100 different artists drew 100 original variant covers based on the Sketch Edition to benefit the Hero Initiative, a charity dedicated to comic creators in need. The covers have been collected as The Walking Dead 100 Project. The third printing and the second printings of #97-99 and #101-102 connect to create a giant landscape of Negan and Lucille. click to enlarge
